name: Unstable Date
description:
Control your feelings in an unusual first date!

Made for the Godot Wild Jam 49, with the theme "Unstable". I also used the Colossal Creature and a Blast From the Pastel wild cards.

 Controls

  • Mouse to move the magnet and left click to activate it.
  • Space bar to advance the text.

---

Even with the extended time I wasn't able to add a main screen nor a pause button and music, sorry! I'll probably add them after the voting period ends
